WRITING.TITLE: Reddit, what's the grossest thing that has ever happened to you?
Cigarette smokers of Reddit, what made you start smoking?

WRITING.TEXT: Where I work its policy for us to request ID if the card is not signed or if it says see ID. I have that written on the back of my card, because it's safer that way if someone did steal my card ( not that they would get very far, I work minimum wage).
